name: Ezio Auditore
bio: He was the son of Giovanni Auditore da Firenze.
A skilled assassin and a member of the Assassins' Brotherhood.
Ezio was trained by his mentor, Lorenzo de' Medici.
He traveled extensively throughout Italy and fought in many battles.
lore: The city-states of Florence and Rome were divided into two main factions: the Republic of Florence and the Holy Roman Empire.
The Italian Renaissance saw a resurgence of interest in classical Greek and Roman culture.
The Medici family held significant power and influence during this period.
The Pope, Clement VII, played a major role in shaping European politics.
